attributes.action: refund student accommodation that's already been paid
attributes.additional_details: Direct the university accommodation services to offer full refunds for those that need it.
attributes.background: fraudulent money grabbing universities to refund student accommodation that's already been paid when they only have to be on campus for half to 1 day and the rest of their courses are on line

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for landlords, including universities. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
